Text.Page:
Clearly, the vampirs are behind Jadan's death—there's no other creature that goes about draining blood. Disgusting habit.

Luckily, my grandfather taught me something very important long ago—they can't stand galicho. He also taught me how to create a potion that amplifies its scent—and trust me, no one would want to, but for this.

If you can get me that weed, I can make a foul—but useful—potion.

Exce—whoa! It smells even worse than I remember.

Well, better get to it, then.

Without that weed, there's no preventing the vampirs from doing to us all what they did to Jadan.

I recommend you get moving.
